roleset.name: travel
roleset.note: JOURNEY-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from journey.01-v)
JOURNEY-N NOTES: Based on sentences in wsj. Comparison to journey.01. VN class run-51.3.2. Framed by Katie. (from journey.01-n)

example.name: get out of town
example.text: Giffen had already urged him-1 [*-1] to journey south , if only for a few days [*-2]to clear up matters .
example.arg: if only for a few days

example.name: arg 0 and debateable dir (could be gol too)
